name: TGBN Mergers & Acquisitions
overview:
TGBN Mergers & Acquisitions is an independently owned Australian company. We bring together people, capital and ideas to produce solutions and results for our entrepreneur clients by playing a number of roles: facilitator, negotiator, advisor.

We are specifically seeking opportunities in the tech space for our buyer’s and investors.

A Sale of Business,Mergers & Acquisitions, Capital raising, Management buy-outs, Divestments and new Partnerships can be a highly sensitive process. You will receive practical solutions to the sensitivities involved, excellence in service, discretion and up to date market knowledge. As facilitators with unrivalled experience in the M & A field, we work closely with all parties involved in a transaction to orchestrate finely tuned, positive commercial outcomes for our clients.
